website_summaries.verdict: Super kid-friendly design on this audio-only monitor, which also monitors temperature and allows you to talk back to baby.
pros: Cute design that also serves as a nightlight for baby
Comes with a hanger on the parent unit to make it easy to carry with you around the house
2-way talking function to help you soothe baby
Night-light can be turned on or off remotely from the parent unit
Includes a vibration alert function for parents
cons: The thermostat can run a little lower than the actual temperature

customer_reviews.title: Battery only option for both units!
customer_reviews.text: The thing I love about this is that both units can be used with battery power only. I wanted a monitor to use when we're camping and it is almost impossible to find them with battery options on both. The reception is really good, very clear sound. I like that it shows the temperature in the baby's room and the range for it is really good. What I don't really like is that on the parent unit you can't dim the light. When a noise activates it at night the blue light is really intense and lights up the whole room. Also, the rechargeable battery on the parent unit doesn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: P Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cord free baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: This might be an “old school” style baby monitor, but it’s perfect for when you need a cord free baby monitor. We have a fancy video monitor in the nursery, but our son doesn’t always necessarily always sleep there, so when he falls asleep in our bedroom or living room we can just pop this next to him and carry on with what we need to do. We plan to take this camping as well. So far we’ve been pleased with the battery life, sound sensitivity, range and the price. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: ***Update*** Perfect for Camping
customer_reviews.text: ***I bought these one year ago and am sorry to have to update my review as I am slightly disappointed. The baby unit has died and I now find myself searching for another set of battery powered monitors. I get they were inexpensive, but it is frustrating nonetheless. I bought these specifically because both units are battery powered. We take them in the motorhome when we travel. The sound quality and range are both excellent. I like that it has a “talkback” feature and that it tells us the temperature. This is especially important in the motorhome, where the climate is a little bit harder to control than at home. Plus they are just plain cute! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors minus the battery life
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these monitors, I bought them for vacation, sound quality is good. They are easy to take with you for quick trips. I would have given 5 stars, however, Unfortunately the battery life is minimal. I charge them, make sure they are turned off and packed them to travel and when I turn them on they are at half battery or lower in less than 2 or 3 hours packed away for travel. And its not like I can easily take out the batteries due to the compartment needing to be unscrewed. Not sure if I got faulty batteries or not. I wish they lasted longer 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. I have tried 3 other monitors that were ruddy awful. The sound on this is clear as day, range is good, temperature gauge helps me plan how to dress my kiddo for bed, solid clip on back of it, battery life is incredible. I wish I had known about this monitor right off the bat. I could've saved 100 bucks in crappy monitor purchases. Oh, it also plays music, but it's too loud for nighttime usage, in my opinion. My daughter does love to listen to it during the day though.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is awful
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these. It’s really hard to find simple, battery-powered baby monitors, and we thought these would be great for camping. Unfortunately, the battery life of the baby “end” of the set is so awful that they were pretty much unusable. With a full charge, it lasted about 40 minutes. So unless your bedtime is 40 minutes later than your infant’s, I wouldn’t bother with these. We sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Echo S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome features!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little audio monitor set. It comes in a nice compact carrying case so u can easily take it with you wherever you go. My son loves the night light feature and I love the fact I don’t have to have it constantly on (u can set it to vibrate so when it detects noise, it vibrates loudly). There’s also a LOT of musical choices to play. So ur baby doesn’t get bored with always listening to the same.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It has great range even if you are outside and the kids are inside
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is exactly what I was looking for. We live on a farm and I have lots of outside chores to do. I can take the monitor with me everywhere I need to go, and hear crystal clear if the kids are waking up. The added feature of being able to talk to them to let them know I’m coming is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping! This was the only baby monitor I could find we are both units could operate on batteries. The batteries do not seem to last a long time on the baby unit, but I’ll take what I can get for something to use for camping!
customer_reviews.author: BreckGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Newborns
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item after having our son, he was very small when he was born and we were constantly worried about him. This item picks up even the smallest sounds which is great for babies that grow into children who make no noise and like to do evil things. There's a light that you can turn on for a night light, and you can also talk back from the parent monitor to the baby. Overall, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KirstenMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome range!
customer_reviews.text: Great simple baby monitor. The range and sound quality are very good. However, the battery life isn't that great. We used these while on a camping trip and they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Vino

customer_reviews.title: Great battery operated monitor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this monitor to use while camping, since it has the battery only option. The range is good, and the microphone is very sensitive. I can even hear my son breathing. The baby unit drains batteries fairly quickly (one set lasts us two or three nights) but I’m honestly not surprised and can’t complain. This is a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: When it works it’s great but when it doesn’t, it’s very inconvenient. We have had it since June and in the last week it’s been powering on but not finding the signal. It happens at night mostly and really inconvenient when you want to go to bed and you can’t get the monitor working. It also makes a loud beep when they don’t connect. That beep in turn wakes the baby up. I would not buy this again. I bought it to replace one that was cheaper and it works better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Worked for what we needed, but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the only monitor I can find that’s really actually battery powered on both ends so can be used for tent camping or power outages. It serves its purpose, but with a *ton* of static, and the batteries need charging at least once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Bleckley

customer_reviews.title: Great idea problematic quality
customer_reviews.text: A great product with some quality issues. Our first one stopped charging within the return period so was replaced. The new unit just lost charging capacity. I can manually change the batteries. But annoying. Only 10 months into new unit. Super helpful for falling asleep on car rides pre covid!!
customer_reviews.author: KitchenClockUser

customer_reviews.title: Very Good and have great distance
customer_reviews.text: These work like a charm. The only issue is battery life but I keep them plugged in mostly but love the distance over a 100 feet. Very nice! I hear everything and the temp feature is a great bonus. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: APrat 1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously awesome!! It has the option to plug in or run on batteries. I looked at so many of them but couldn't see spending so much on one just for a camera. The sound is perfect. I can talk to my little girl through it. Plays music. More importantly gives me peace of mind that I can transition her to her crib and not worry about missing her cries. My husband told me this is my best Amazon purchase lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Monitors that both monitors use batteries!!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched high and low for a baby monitor that both (parent and child) monitors take batteries for when we go camping!! Its only a plus that it displays the temperature and has a night light. SO happy to have these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bird

customer_reviews.title: Battery operated baby unit worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This monitor offers battery operated baby unit. These were easy to use, did everything perfectly that it advertised. Easy to understand instructions. Lots of features. One tip, the battery life seemed short, so you might need several for a trip. This review is for the 'owl' model.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work if you're using a white noise machine
customer_reviews.text: The monitor would not pick up baby noises over the white noise machine at all, literally couldn't hear my kid screaming, lol. It's pretty useless, and I was only using it about 100 feet away from his bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Did not live up to my expectations and not as simple as it should be. Picks up more static than it should. I can’t ever seem to adjust it correctly. Too few buttons with too many different functions.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping
customer_reviews.text: These worked great while we were out camping however the rechargeable batteries in the infant unit would die after 1 hour, the parent unit would die after 2 hours, but once we replaced them with triple A batteries they lasted about 3 days. The lullabies were songs that hit really high pitches and no white noise but luckily we had white noise downloaded on our phones and just played that in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Estabrook

customer_reviews.title: Why Wouldn't It Include Two of Each Thing?!
customer_reviews.text: The main reason we went with this monitor is because both baby and parent units can be operated by battery (handy for camping, baby falling asleep somewhere without an outlet, etc.) OR plugged into an outlet but, bizarrely, the package only comes with one USB adaptor and one set of rechargeable batteries. Not the biggest deal in the world (each of these things can be purchased separately), but it's peculiar that they wouldn't come packaged. (FYI, The "manual" confirms that only of each is included.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Temperature sensor is off by 10 degrees. It beeps at 59 and you can’t turn it off. I checked with my laser thermometer and it’s the device that’s off. Woke us up in the middle of the night. The USB plug also falls out easily. Works well most of the time but I need to to work great all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. I bought them for camping when we don't have electric to plug in. The only complaint is it doesn't have 2 sets of rechargable batteries and they don't last very long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.  Both devices have batteries.
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly. It takes four batteries (2x device). It came with 2 rechargeable batteries, which died the first night, though maybe I was suppose to fully charge before use. I would just recommend putting in 4 regular batteries, since you have to use at least 2 anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: BOTH UNITS BATTERY AND WALL PLUG POWER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This us an amazing monitor set!!! Our power goes off when its windy, some tut times lasting a week and this gas both units battery operated which is a must!!! Its sooo cool a baby monitor I'll be buy an additional one for my son and his fiancee's baby shower!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Webb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Camping
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use in our camper so we can hang out around the campfire after putting our child down for the night. These work great. Easy to use, very clear audio quality. Not too much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Brayde W

customer_reviews.title: just buy new batteries
customer_reviews.text: Love them but hate the battery life.. just buy new batteries. I keep them in the toy hauler for camping 🏕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. So useful
customer_reviews.text: Love ALL the features of this product. Cant wait to use it while camping. I do wish that i could figure out how to turn the music down with the parent device and also wish that the music would play continuously. And oh so cute. Will probably another for gifting in the future. Worked for everything i needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni Roepke

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is great for what you are paying for it
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great for what you are paying for it. I love that both ends can run on batteries if you need to which is great for when you are out of the home and do not have a place to plug it in. The night light is a little too bright for me and the thermostat is about 4° lower then the actual temperature, but since I know that I just add 4° to what I see and it works for me. It's really cute and does everything I need it too and more. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Huxley

customer_reviews.title: Not a good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Crackles all the time. The baby monitor doesn't like to charge and when it says it's fully charged, it will die within a couple hours if not plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chad

customer_reviews.title: Battery life non-existent
customer_reviews.text: Batteries dont last long at all. Aftet only 30 mins thr batteries started to die. No nighy vision or picture but i knew that when i purchased. The sound times out and you cabt hear anythinh unless you keep pressing the volume button. I returned a few days later, very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My only gripe is that they only included enough batteries for one of the devices. Other than that it works great as a cordless baby monitor. We take these with us to relatives houses and walk around with it while leaving one with the baby. Love the night light feature and temperature reading
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Kalatizadeh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the amount
customer_reviews.text: Great experience with the product. It is not only cute but also has great functions and totally worth the money. The sound function is also very clear and one of the best so far. The quality of the product is very good with excellent customer service. When I'm in the kitchen or somewhere else in the room, I can still hear my baby and keep a check on him. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Harshita Gayatri Singh

customer_reviews.title: THE RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES THAT COMES WITH UNIT WONT HARD A CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: The product works well...when its working. But the rechargeable batteries that came with it wont hold a charge. Can you send me new rechargeable batteries please?
customer_reviews.author: snowvet

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great look and size, the only thing is the music is a bit too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Very cute matching penguin monitors. They work well on battery. Note: the status light on the “receiver” (the unit in the baby’s room” is a very bright green. Invest in some electrical tape.
customer_reviews.author: BN East

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used this once so far but I’m glad we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: If you have a toddler that doesn’t like to be alone at night this is the perfect thing. My daughter adores having the penguin and the easy access to talking to us in the evening. This has saved countless trips walking up and down the stairs and make her feel totally secure. The temperature reader is off by about 10 degrees but I love this device so much I still gave it all the stars.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great if you need to be away during nap time
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great, sound is great and distance of transmission is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: crazy man.

customer_reviews.title: Portable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed - a portable solution for travel and back up.
customer_reviews.author: S McCrory

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these baby monitors in august, it is now November and the parent unit has completely stopped working and won’t turn on at all. Really disappointed by the quality of these for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: angel G.

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless product
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact the baby unit is wireless - dislike the fact it only came with rechargeable batteries for one unit when both unit need rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: Worked for maybe a couple weeks then the parent unit quit working.. couldnt hear the baby unit unless i pressed the volume button a couple times. Then it wouldnt charge either. Zero battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jillisa Goossen

customer_reviews.title: Read package contents
customer_reviews.text: Product is great works well only gave 4 stars because it only comes with 1 set or rechargeable batteries. I didn’t realize until I got to the camp site had to search for an hour to find a store with AAA batteries
customer_reviews.author: jesse combes

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor on market. Both parents and baby are 100% portable without a cord that include rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Battery life shot
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not last on this monitor for more than 3-4 hours max and now won’t charge at all, less than 9 months after buying it. Very disappointed I’m unable to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and true to description!
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward instructions and easy to understand. I like that both units are battery operated and can be cordless. Nice design and look! Recommend for purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CRS Walder

customer_reviews.title: Cute and effected
customer_reviews.text: These cute Penguins are amazing. I love the fact that I can turn on the tummy light , talk if needed. And it also plays lullabys .
customer_reviews.author: Tina Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Too bad I was hopeful!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying, despite brand new batteries the monitor in babies room/tent barely lasted an hour or two
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable monitor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect monitor for camping in such that you don’t need a power source!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent product that gives you the flexibility to move around or stay plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Only one plug
customer_reviews.text: Only comes with one plug:( so the second one is on battery power the whole time
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy & Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Good deal for the price. We like using the nightlight feature as an "ok to wakeup" feature for our preschooler.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best baby monitors for camping. They vibrate and have sound when baby is crying. I took these camping and the range on them is wonderful. I was able to go a very far distance and still hear my baby. They also have the temperature which is very helpful in the summer time. When using I had no interference which I loved. If you need battery operated baby monitor these are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Bowers

product_meta.title: TimeFlys Audio Baby Monitor Digital Mustang with Long Range Two-Way Talk Temperature Monitoring and Warning Lullabies Vibration LCD Display Night Light
feature_bullets: PACKAGE - The parent unit additionally comes with rechargeable NiHM batteries, while both baby and parent units contain battery compartments and Micro USB connection.
TWO-WAY TALK & LULLABIES - Parents can talk to and comfort the baby by pressing the talking button. Lull your baby to sleep with a wide option range of up to 8 lullabies!
NIGHT LIGHT CONTROL - Parents can remotely control the night light for the baby anytime needed.
ACOUSTICS & VIBRATION - Acoustics and vibration work interchangeably to help parents stay alert for the baby.

TEMPERATURE MONITORING & ALARM - The LCD screen of the parent unit indicates the real-time temperature of the baby room. An acoustical warning will sound when the room temperature is past the range 60.8F - 86F.

specifications.Item model number: Owl Cartoon Outlook with LCD Screen
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars182 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
